snippet.title: Do I Have A Right? 2017 Trailer
snippet.description:
Run your very own firm of lawyers who specialize in constitutional law with the wildly popular and newly upgraded "Do I Have A Right?" game. Upgrades include a Spanish language version -"¿Tengo algún derecho?" ; Bill of Rights Mode; and teacher supports for English Language Learners and struggling readers. 

The more cases you win, the faster your law firm will grow! Can you think on your feet? You're going to have to!
